name: The Idyllic Country Estate
description:
DESCRIPTION
Close to Paris, yet a world away from city life, sits this 19th century estate in the Val d'Oise, between Ile de France and Picardy. An enclave of unique nature, the ecological balance of the estate is preserved by responsible management, care and dedication, making it an idyllic spot for your wedding celebration.
The 140 ha estate of the Château offers:
Unlimited options for your ceremony and reception
Several gites are available: one in Ile de France, the other in Picardy but on the same estate!
A natural place at the gates of Paris
Breathtaking views
No time constraints
Total freedom to choose how you want to plan your day!
No provider imposed - you are free to choose your own suppliers
An on-site manager who guarantees the smooth running of your event
The estate can cater for up to 180 guests for an indoor event. There is also a beautiful 100m2 terrace from which to contemplate the magnificent view of the immense meadows and parkland of the estate.
Onsite, there is a pretty chapel surrounded by its century-old cedars, ideal for a reception or a secular ceremony.
There is also the possibility of installing one or more marquees in the park or of taking advantage of the vault of the large stables building (500m2) as an excellent Plan B option.
Ample parking and access and a lack of neighbours adds to the sense of freedom!
The team at the Chateau will be there to support you throughout the planning stages and the event itself. They can offer you their recommended caterers, ideas for daytime and evening entertainment, hotels, or more original accommodation options within the estate.
Secular ceremonies or reception
Whether religious, secular or "for all", the team are here to help - What could be better than your secular ceremony under the cedars!
Included in the base price:
The total privatization of the ground floor of the castle, the terrace, the park between the ponds, the chapel and the large meadows
Interior and exterior lighting
End of stay cleaning
The presence of a manager on site
The power needed in the kitchen for the caterer's ovens and fridge
The park for your photos
The surroundings of the chapel for your ceremony and your reception
Parking for all
Electricity
WiFi
A preferential rate for the rental of your furniture and decoration
And lots of ideas and inspiration for you!
ACCOMMODATION
Combining calm, comfort and practicality in a preserved natural setting, the Gîtes will leave you with unforgettable memories.
Gite 1 - 5 guests
Gite 2 - 6 guests
5 rooms on the first floor of the Chateau - 13 guests
Glamping in the grounds is also available.
PRICING:
Weekend Formula (bare castle) from Saturday morning 8am to Sunday 6pm:
High season (May 15 to August 1 and August 16 to September 30) 4500 €
Mid season (April 15 to May 15, August 2 to August 15 and October 1 to October 30) 4200 €
Low season (November 1 to April 15) 3400 € including heating
Friday from 10 a.m. to Saturday 8 a.m.: €3,000 public holidays: €3,000 Other weekdays: €2,000
For further information please do get in touch.
additional_info:
